law.catch_line: Licensure by endorsement for veterinarians licensed in other jurisdictions.

text.section: The board shall not issue a license by endorsement to any applicant who is under investigation in another state, territory, or the District of Columbia for an act which could result in disciplinary action in that jurisdiction until the investigation and disciplinary proceedings have been completed.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992.
